import * as React from 'react'; import './index.scss'; import {useState} from "react"; import ReCAPTCHA from "react-google-recaptcha"; import {commonValidate, validateMail} from "./Service"; const Register: React.FC = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(null); const [mail, setMail] = useState(null); const [address, setAddress] = useState(null); const [phoneNumber, setPhoneNumber] = useState(null); const [pass, setPass] = useState(null); const [repeatPass, setRepeatPass] = useState(null); const styleValidate = (check: boolean | null, type: 'text' | 'icon'): React.CSSProperties => { if (check) return {}; else if (type === 'text') return {visibility: 'visible'}; else return {color: 'red'}; } console.log(styleValidate((commonValidate(name, /^[a-zA-z\s]{6,25}$/) || name === null), 'text')) const formRegisterLeft = () => { return (
Sign up
setName(event.target.value)}/>
Your name must has 6-50 characters
setMail(event.target.value)}/>
illegal
setAddress(event.target.value)}/>
Your name must has 6-50 characters
setPhoneNumber(event.target.value)}/>
Your name must has 6-50 characters
setPass(event.target.value)}/>
Your name must has 6-50 characters
setRepeatPass(event.target.value)}/>
Your name must has 6-50 characters
{ }}/>
) } const formRegisterRight = () => { return (
Login now
) } return (
{formRegisterLeft()} {formRegisterRight()}
) } export default Register;
